      • setStateCode

        public void setStateCode(java.lang.String stateCode)
        Sets the standard 2 letter abbreviation for the US state or Canadian province. A data validation error occurs if state code is populated and country code is not US or CA.
        Parameters:
        stateCode - 2 letter state abbreviation
